vote.title: Authorize (1) Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to add armored car services to the service contract for bank depository services with Bank of America, N.A. through an Interlocal Agreement with Dallas County, Texas for a term of forty months - Not to exceed $1,600,000, from $7,293,185 to $8,893,185; and (2) the ratification of $437,342 for the City Controller’s Office to pay outstanding invoices for citywide armored car services for City facilities to Brink’s Incorporated, formerly known as Dunbar Armored, Inc. - Total amount not to exceed $2,037,342 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,684,163.00), Aviation Fund ($118,694), Building Inspection Fund ($77,914), Sanitation Operation Fund ($63,655), Convention and Event Services Fund ($52,200), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($32,650), and Express Business Center Fund ($8,066) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize (1) Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to add armored car services to the service contract for bank depository services with Bank of America, N.A. through an Interlocal Agreement with Dallas County, Texas for a term of forty months - Not to exceed $1,600,000, from $7,293,185 to $8,893,185; and (2) the ratification of $437,342 for the City Controller’s Office to pay outstanding invoices for citywide armored car services for City facilities to Brink’s Incorporated, formerly known as Dunbar Armored, Inc. - Total amount not to exceed $2,037,342 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,684,163.00), Aviation Fund ($118,694), Building Inspection Fund ($77,914), Sanitation Operation Fund ($63,655), Convention and Event Services Fund ($52,200), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($32,650), and Express Business Center Fund ($8,066) (subject to annual appropriations)
